entries.meaning: The state, quality, condition, or jurisdiction of being a pope; papacy.
examples: This was the holy man who first gave this goodly creature of the popeship to the world.

entries.meaning: A term used as a title or designation.
examples: Why, there has gone already to Rome a messenger to crave a second dispensation from his Popeship, and the King himself hath signed the request, praying that you and I should graciously be permitted to wed!
